entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 4. POP 70%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers changing to 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 5:46 PM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
